scenerio.textBox: Welcome to the Mysterious Ruins. Do you want to play?
scenerio.no: Then why did you open the app??

scenerio.textBox: Stone ruins lay before you. The ruins seem to be a small village. Nature has taken the area back over which makes traveling difficult. You are only able to move north.
You see an empty archway, to your west, that leads into what seems to be an old stone house or at least what is left of it. The path also continues North.
When you enter the archway the room is framed as a rough ten foot square. Disturbed leaves and dirt in the corner catch your eye. Do you want to investigate?
scenerio.yes: While investigating the ground gives way and you fall into a hole never to be found again.
scenerio.no: Head back east to the pathway.
